meta.description: Determine the number of hot-air balloon and gondola lift rides to minimize pollution while transporting at least 70 visitors.

params.name: capacity
params.description: Number of visitors each transport method can carry.

params.name: pollution
params.description: Pollution units produced by each transport method.

vars.name: rides
vars.description: Number of rides for each transport method.

objective.name: min_total_pollution
objective.expr: sum(pollution[t] * rides[t] for t in TRANSPORT_METHODS)
objective.description: Minimize the total pollution produced by the transport methods.

constraints.name: visitor_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(capacity[t] * rides[t] for t in TRANSPORT_METHODS)
constraints.description: At least 70 visitors need to be transported.

constraints.name: max_hot_air_balloon_rides
constraints.description: There can be at most 10 hot-air balloon rides.
